content: i have decided to offer this one as a freebie now hope you enjoy it you get the pattern for both the spider and the bat even spooky guys like to dress up too these little guys wanted to play for halloween they are quick and easy to crochet all you really need is some stuffing and worsted weight yarn additional embellishments are optional this is an easy pattern you must know how to work in rounds there are no special stitches used in this pattern finished size both are approximately 6 1/2 tall
